lines.text: [Ryback has been revealed as the intruder, supposedly dead]
When she shot the intruder, did you see the body?
No, just a shit load of blood, and I figured if you get run over by a train...
[Penn smacks Merc 1 hard]

[slow and menacing]
Did... you... see... the body?
I ASSUMED he was DEAD!
Assumption is the MOTHER of all fuck ups!
Nobody beats me in the kitchen.
I not only INVENTED Grazer, I've UPDATED it to use part of the electromagnetic spectrum ATAC is only DIMLY aware of.

[referring to the transmitter]
What the hell is that?

As long as we're moving, the signal is completely transparent. AS you can see, we're on a choo-choo. No stop signs for six hours. ATAC would KILL to get a hold of this technology. In fact, I'm sure they'll try.
...works just as well underground, underwater...
I not only designed the SYSTEM, I designed the BLOCKS!
What are you doing, Dane?
I'm hacking into ATAC, Linda.
[pulls out a second keyboard]
Now. Watch this!
[types both codes into both keyboards, successfully]
It's MINE again!
[Ryback and Penn started to fight with the knives and after a few seconds Ryback cuts Penn's coat]
Fuck, you ruined my coat...
Now this is where the shit really starts to fly. A fertilizer plant in Guangzhou.
A fertilizer plant?

Yeah, I'm gonna shock the world by spreading ca-ca all over the place. Guangzhou is a chemical weapons plant masquerading as a fertilizer plant. We know this. The Chinese know that we know. But we make-believe that we don't know and the Chinese make-believe that they believe that we don't know, but know that we know. Everybody knows.
They said you were dead.
Yeah, very restful, no phone calls. Now you two have been *very naughty*. ATAC has *strict* rules about employees becoming involved with each other.
Is that what this is about?
Ugh, yeah, right! I uh... FAKED my own death and *hijacked a passenger train* because *I* care about who YOU'RE FUCKING! No, I was just wondering what other *rules* you might be willing to break.

[Dane just popped on the screens at ATAC with a Parisian background behind him]
Bonjour guys. Comment allez-vous?
Who the hell is that?
Jesus Christ!
Uh, not quite, General Cooper. Although, I have sort of risen from the dead! No, it's just your old friend Travis Dane. You remember. They guy you FIRED!

[Dane is looking through Ryback's palm-pilot]
Ryback's tactics.
Ryback?
That's what is says... Ryback.
Casey fuckin' Ryback?
Jesus Christ.
Who's Casey fucking Ryback?
Casey Ryback is a former SEAL Team captain. And a *counter-terrorism expert*.
He was my instructor at Fort Bragg.
He's the *best there is*.
I thought *you* were the best there is, Penn.
Something's coming in. Intermittent signals, very faint.
F-117s. Stealths.
They found us! Casey *Fucking* Ryback!
Shoot 'em down.
I'd have to unlock Grazer from Washington. I don't have the transponder numbers! I CAN'T TARGET THEM! They'd kill all the hostages!
Empty your pockets. I said empty your goddamn pockets right now!

All right, all right, all right man. I'm just a kid, man, c'mon I'm just a kid! I'm trying to tell you, I lost it down there, I ripped my pocket, everything fell out. The only thing I've got in my pocket, man, is your ASS!
[shoots him]

[hearing the shot from a distance]
Porter checked!

[thinking that the porter was just thrown from the chopper]
Honey, you sure taught that boy how to fly.

[falsetto]
Oh, we sure did, honey! So now what we're going to do is we're gonna keep this chopper right here, OK. Or I'm going to blow your MOTHERFUCKING BRAINS OUT! You got that? Honey?
Ryback's hitting the hostage cars.

[livid]
RRRRRRRRYBACK!
[Ryback has Dane at gunpoint]

[gleefully]
Shooting me won't do any good. ATAC can't get past my ghost satellites and YOU can't get past my encrypted program.
You mean to tell me there's no way I can just shut that off?

[boastfully]
No way!
[Ryback shoots the laptop, the bullet passes through and hits Dane. ATAC Resumes control of the satellite]
I Never thought of that.
[falls out of the train]
[Penn has a knife to Dane's nose]
You let *me* handle Ryback. And *you* take care of the techno-shit. He's mine. I'll take him myself hand-to hand.

[to the computer]
C'mon my little Ghost Satellites. I need you with me to hide my baby up there, so she can blow the *fuck out of Washington.*

[to Penn]
Yeah, go get your throat ripped out. I've got 8 million people to kill and a billion dollars to pick up.

You know, I never considered myself a vicious person. But you, you're like a fucking cockroach! So what do you do when the little bastard shows himself? You squash him, right? Get what I'm trying to say to you here bus boy?
I'm a porter, not a bus boy.

[laughing]
Okay, Mister porter. You got balls, man. So I'm gonna let you decide, okay? You wanna see it coming... or do you wanna turn around?

[seeing Ryback come in]
Hey... you wanna help me out here, man?

[Casey Ryback breaks Bobby Zachs's neck]
Oh shit, you definitely are a bad motherfucker. Let's go kick some more ass, though.
[Repeated line]
Chance favors the prepared mind.
Ryback's gone, Dane.
Did you see the body? Assumption is the mother of all FUCK UPS!
[addressing the passengers by videophone]

Good evening, ladies and gentlemen. This is your captor speaking. There's been a slight change in your travel plans tonight. You have, you will note, been moved to the last two cars of the train for your own well-being. First, I'd like to call your attention to the highly trained men with the automatic weapons in your cars. In the event of an emergency, they may be called upon to shoot you. Your safety IS our primary concern. However, if you try anything stupid, Federal Regulations require that I kill you. So please, no hero shit!
300,000 pages of code. Or 60 minutes of triple-X rubber-and-leather bondage porno. Technology can be used for beauty, or debasement. And until you plug it in, you'll just never know.
[Puts the CD-ROM in the drive]
Oh, oh! I seem to have brought up targeting codes.
Check the baggage!
[Mercenary 3 shoots up the baggage]
Baggage checked!
You're entering into another dimension, not only of sight or sound but of mind. There's a signpost up ahead. Your next stop? Dark Territory!
[He has just activated the switch up ahead]
Who says I have a one-track mind?
[preparing the satellite for an attack on China]
Now pay close attention, Mr. Penn. I'm about to make the Bophal disaster look like a Girl Scout picnic!

[to Sarah Ryback]
You know I've never been afraid of anybody. But that uncle of yours scares me... and I like it.

[Dane figures out how to stop the Stealths]
Turbulence. If it moves, Grazer can see it.
[goes to the computer and starts hitting keys]
They disturb the air as they fly through it. Low altitude turbulence, that's how you find these things.
[Two blips appear onscreen]
There you are.
[chuckles]
Stealths. I can target these.

[distracting the Merc]
I broke my bra!
[Ryback kills the Merc]
Tits to die for, huh?

[whispering to Sarah, about the mercenaries]
Who are they looking for?

[whispering back]
Me!

[as he prepares to blow up a Chinese chemical plant]
Poison gas, chemical fire, total devastation for a one hundred mile radius... thousands of people are going to die.

[Trilling just revealed his code, Gilder glares at him]
He can't use the code.

[angrily]
Why do you think he's doing this, David?
Because he's crazy.
You can argue that point later. NEXT! Are we up for this?

[Female Merc is bringing the hot needle steadily closer to Trilling's eye]
You can't hack into the system. There are quadruple blocks. Linda, even if you could, the codes need to be entered simultaneously. There's not enough power here. you've seen the size of the ATAC generators. C'mon it's impossible! You know that! The codes, they're different now. They're no good for anything. He can't use them!

[the needle is almost touching his eye]
Linda! For God's sake, please, GIVE HIM THE CODE! GIVE... HIM... THE... CODE! AHHH! AHHH! AHHH!
E U I 4 7 6!
They fired me! Broke into my lab! Confiscated EVERYTHING! Told me the technology was NON-ESSENTIAL! Well they WANTED it! They're gonna *GET IT*!

[Startled by railroad torpedoes exploding outside]
What was that?
It is called an orgasm.
[first lines]
Tom, thanks for coming.
Is this your lunch?
What am I doing? Oh, I'm making a bomb.
Not mace, sweetheart. Pepper spray. Sold to civilians.
[snatches canister from Sarah]
But once you get used to it...
[sprays some into his mouth]
...it just clears the sinuses!
That's what I hear. Mostly from you. But that's what I hear.
[aiming at the hijackers]
Ok, safety off...
[he fires at them, they return fire]
It's that fuckin' porter.
I shouldn't have got back on this fuckin' train.

[over radio]
Penn?
Ryback.
I'm coming to get my niece now.
Come and get her.
You take one more step and I'm dropping this grenade.
Ok... then drop it.

[after spotting the terrorists from the kitchen car, and reentering from the pantry and seeing spilled blood]
Now, this I'm trained for!
You think this is being shot? This ain't being shot.
[seeing Captains Linda Gilder and David Trilling having sex in a train compartment]
Well, here you are. The last place anyone would expect to find you. Amazing.
[checking the passenger list and finding out that Ryback has a fellow traveler]
+1. It could be his girl or a child.
Maybe it's wife or something.
Man doesn't call his wife +1.
So, what? We're looking for some babe?
Some bait.
[last lines]
Ah, this is Casey Ryback, the hostages are safe.
[after warning of his impending strike on the Pentagon]
I was smarter than all of you before I worked there. I was smarter than all of you while I worked there. And I'm still smarter than all of you. Au revoir.
[about the particle-beam weapon]
Are you telling me this goddamn thing is working now?
In fact, Admiral, it works so effectively that if we were to target the Los Angeles fault lines, in fifteen seconds... Arizona would be beachfront property.
[about Travis Dane]
He's a brilliant guy, he can do virtually anything he puts his mind to, but he's a crazy son of a bitch...
Why would you people hire a goddamn maniac-?

[impatiently]
Because, Admiral, sane people do not build weapons like this.
You know, Mr. Breaker... you'd think we'd learn something from that.
[Ryback comes into the bar car and sees Sarah sitting in the corner with a glass]
Hi. Um, I was just wondering what the girl in the corner there was drinking?
You mean the little girl with the tonic and lime, and the bad I.D.?
That's the one.

[after he makes Grazer One blow up a plane]
Boom. Earthquake in midair.
I'll never... give you the code.

Our psychological profile on you says you will. However, if you wish to prove that profile incorrect, watch closely as an intensly hot needle penetrates the lens of one of the most beautiful eyes in the world. The needlepoint will pass through the lens with, very little difficulty. The heat will cauterize and seal the wound, but will continue to transfer heat into the fluid of the eye. The fluid comes to a boil, and the eyeball itself... explodes.
[last lines]
Ryback...
[Casey and Bobby look to see Dane dangling on fire from the helicopter]
RYBACK!...
[with a sneer, Casey slams the door on Dane's hands severing his fingers]
RY... BACK!...
[plunges into a fireball far below]
